text: How does your team ensure that code remains maintainable over time?
category: Capabilities that enable a Climate for Learning

answers.text: We donâ€™t have a defined approach
We use basic linting and formatting tools
We follow code review and documentation guidelines
We apply automated maintainability checks and refactoring practices
We have a culture of continuous refactoring and evolutionary architecture

text: How does your team ensure the quality and usefulness of documentation?
category: Capabilities that enable a Climate for Learning

answers.text: We rarely document or our documentation is outdated
We create basic documentation for major features when needed
We maintain up-to-date documentation for key systems and processes
We have standards for documentation quality and regularly review it
We treat documentation as a core deliverable, with clear ownership, continuous improvement, and easy discoverability
